description: An indiscretion of exposure happened in a Zoom meeting. CNN says the analyst will be taking some time off.
content: The Erik Wemple Blog texted Toobin to ask for an interview. He responded that he had nothing to add to his statement and asked us to let him know if anything is unclear. We responded that its uncerta… [+1140 chars]

author: Nicki Jhabvala
title: Ron Rivera says Sunday’s bold call fits Washington’s top priority: Win games now
description: After a 1-5 start and Sunday's bold decision to go for two, Ron Rivera says his plan for the Washington Football Team remains focused on winning as many games as possible.
content: If we had succeeded on it, it wouldve been a great decision on my part, he said with a grin during a video conference with reporters Monday. But we didnt, so some people think its not a good decision… [+4331 chars]
